did.head: Collection Overview

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Smith College. Dept. of Latin American Studies.

did.unittitle: Department of Latin American Studies Records
did.abstract: This collection is in one box and contains a flyer advertising a department lecture.

bioghist.p: The Latin American Studies Department at Smith College began as an Interdepartmental Major in Latin American Studies in 1987. The department's name changed to the Latin American and Latino/a Studies at the beginning of the 1997-1998 academic year.

scopecontent.p: The Latin American Studies Department records contain materials describing a department lecture. Types of materials include one flyer.

accessrestrict.p: The records are open for research according to the regulations of the Smith College Archives without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.p: Single photocopies may be made for research purposes. Permission to publish material from the documents must be requested from the Smith College Archives. Smith College owns copyright to any published material relating to college events and activities. Provenance and copyright ownership of other materials is unknown and researchers are responsible for determining any question of copyright.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Please use the following format when citing materials from this collection:
Smith College Dept. of Latin American Studies Box #, Smith College Archives.

acqinfo.p: The Latin American Studies Department records were created by the department and donated to the College Archives.
